Class Shop

java.lang.Object
Shop.Shop
public class Shop extends Object
Shop class ot handle buy and sell monsters and items

    • sellItems

      public void sellItems(Item item, Player playerr)
      Remover the items from player's inventory and add the gold back to player's gold collection player will only get 80% of gold they spent on the item back
      Parameters:
      item - item that will be sold
      playerr - player where the item will be taken from
